messages.content: Thank you for calling Nestlé customer service. My name is Fred. May I know your name, please?
Ursula. I need some information about the Gerber Goodstart Gentle Pro.
Of course, Ursula. I can help with that. What specific information are you looking for about the Gerber Goodstart Gentle Pro?
I want to know why it's been so hard to find it in stores lately. It's really frustrating!
I apologize for the inconvenience, Ursula. There have been some supply chain disruptions recently. We're working hard to restock our products. Have you tried looking for it online?
Yes, I have. It's either out of stock or ridiculously overpriced. This is really stressing me out!

I understand your frustration, Ursula. Let me check our system for any updates on the availability of Gerber Goodstart Gentle Pro and see if I can find a store or an online retailer that has it in stock.
Fine, but this is really unacceptable. I shouldn't have to jump through hoops to get baby formula.

You're absolutely right, Ursula. I apologize for the inconvenience. I've found a couple of online retailers that currently have Gerber Goodstart Gentle Pro in stock. Would you like me to email you the details?
Yes, please do that. I hope this doesn't happen again.
I completely understand, Ursula. I'll send you the details right away. If you have any other questions or need further assistance, please don't hesitate to ask.
Alright, thank you. Just send that email quickly.
